title: Resources to Learn Git
blurb: Assorted resources on git and GitHub.

title: GitHub Guides
blurb: Collection of guides on git and GitHub.

title: Git CLI Fundamentals
blurb: Short video on collaborative coding with git. Use this repo to follow along with second half.

title: HTMLReference.io
blurb: Brief but visually engaging reference.

title: CSSReference.io
blurb: Visual guides on CSS, including Flexbox and Grid.

title: CSS-Tricks: Guides
blurb: Assorted guides on CSS and design, including intros to the more modern Flexbox and Grid.

title: Where Do You Learn HTML & CSS in 2020
blurb: An excellent collection of resources spanning books, courses, bootcamps and more.

title: Don't Fear the Internet
blurb: A series of short, cheeky videos on web fundamentals and traditional CSS design.

title: Learn to Code HTML & CSS
blurb: Solid resource on HTML and CSS basics.

title: W3Schools HTML Tutorial
blurb: No frills, extensive reference. Includes in-browser exercises.

title: W3Schools Javascript Tutorial
blurb: No frills, extensive reference. Includes in-browser exercises.

title: W3Schools CSS Tutorial
blurb: No frills, extensive reference. Includes in-browser exercises.

title: Learn HTML
blurb: A basic HTML course with guided, in-browser exercises.

title: Learn CSS
blurb: CSS course with guided, in-browser exercises.

title: Learn Javascript
blurb: JS course with guided, in-browser exercises.

title: Lena Groeger's Homepage
blurb: Home site of Lena Groeger, deputy editor of news apps at ProPublica.

title: Big List of Resources for Design, Data & Code
blurb: An incredibly well-curated list by Lena Groeger of ProPublica.

title: Eloquent Javascript
blurb: Excellent, well-rounded resource for beginners. Covers JS in the browser and on the server.

title: You Don't Know JS Yet, 2nd Edition
blurb: For the intermediate to advanced Javascript practitioner

title: JavaScript for impatient programmers
blurb: Authoritative, terse and detailed look at ES2021

title: Interneting is Hard
blurb: Nice balance of big picture and hands-on, guided exercises. Covers traditional CSS, FlexBox and subtleties of images, typography and responsive design.

title: HTML Dog
blurb: Gentler intro to HTML, CSS and JS. Tutorials span beginner to advanced.

title: Design & Presentation Course
blurb: A five-day course on "the fundamentals of good presentation, layout, and design for print and the web."

title: Front-end Developer Handbook 2019
blurb: Amazing. Just remember to breathe.

title: Clean Up Your Mess: a Guide to Visual Design for Everyone
blurb: Stop feeling "like a baby when it comes to visual design".

title: A Minimal Introduction to Javascript and Observable
blurb: Terse. Best for those who've coded before.

title: Introducing Arquero
blurb: Arquero brings data frame goodness to JS. Expats of dplyr and pandas will feel at home.

technology: JS, d3, lodash, data wrangling, analysis, Observable
title: Learn JS Data
blurb: An Observable tutorial on data wrangling and analysis with d3 and lodash.

title: Data Visualization Curriculum
blurb: In-depth Observable series on foundations of viz with Vega-Lite. Start here before graduating to D3.

technology: viz, JS, d3, data wrangling, Observable
title: Introduction to D3
blurb: An Observable notebook tutorial on the basics of d3.

technology: JS, d3, viz, data wrangling, Observable
title: Learn D3: A guided tour of your first steps learning D3
blurb: Official tutorial from the creator of D3 and Observable.

title: Observable's Not Javascript
blurb: Details on how Observable "enhances" JS.

title: Video Series: Learning Observable
blurb: Gentle intro to Observable through a series of videos.

title: Introduction to Data
blurb: Brief intro to working with data on Observable.

title: Observable for Vega-Lite
blurb: A shorter tutorial series on data visualization using Vega-Lite.

title: A Taste of Observable
blurb: Good starting point to learn core features of Observable.
